title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions: Introducing the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch. This exquisite timepiece combines style and functionality, making it a must-have for any man. With its gold-tone stainless steel case and black unidirectional timing bezel, this watch exudes elegance. The durable domed mineral crystal and 100m water resistance ensure its longevity. The striking black sunburst dial features gold-tone and silver-tone accents, as well as luminescent hands and markers for easy reading in any light. The watch also boasts chronograph, 24-hour, and calendar displays, offering versatility beyond traditional timepieces. Complete with a matching gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with a sport foldover closure, this watch is the perfect accessory for any adventure. Don't miss out on this luxurious Bulova Marine Star timepiece.

With its domed mineral crystal and 100m water resistance, this watch is built to withstand the elements. In addition to its classic timekeeping function, this watch offers chronograph, 24-hour, and calendar displays, providing practical utility. The watch is completed with a matching gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with curved and faceted links, as well as a sport foldover closure. Elevate your style and embrace adventure with this luxurious Bulova Marine Star timepiece for men.

Title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406

Description: This new addition to Bulova’s legendary Marine Star Collection is a striking men’s 6-hand chronograph and calendar with exquisite style and exceptional functionality. The gold-tone stainless steel case features a black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents and a domed mineral crystal for extra durability, including 100m of water resistance. The dial is a striking black sunburst with gold-tone and silver-tone accents and luminescent hands and markers. This Marine Star watch features chronograph, 24-hour, and calendar displays on the dial, offering utility beyond traditional timepieces. The watch is paired with a matching gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with curved and faceted links and a sport foldover closure. Dare to adventure in luxury with this new men’s Bulova Marine Star timepiece.
